text: Awon ti won ku ninu yin, ti won si fi awon iyawo saye lo, ki won se asoole ije-imu odun kan fun awon iyawo won, lai si nii le won jade kuro ninu ile won. Ti won ba si jade (funra won leyin ijade opo), ko si ese fun yin nipa ohun ti won ba fiâ€™ra won se ni daadaa (lati ni oko miiran). Allahu ni Alagbara, Ologbon
